message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.DS

This paper is about text classification, which is a common topic in natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also discusses the use of deep learning classifiers, which falls under the sub-category cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper mentions the use of techniques such as hashing and subword information, which are commonly used in information retrieval (IR) and artificial intelligence (AI) tasks. Finally, the paper discusses the efficiency of the proposed method, which is related to the sub-category cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms).
